Title: The Girlhood Diary of Louisa May Alcott, 1843-1846.
Subtitle: Writings of a Young Author.

Description: Excerpts from the girlhood diary of Louisa May Alcott, describing her family life, lessons, and experiences on a communal farm in the 1840s. Includes sidebars, activities, and a timeline related to this era..
